subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks have shopped Eddy Curry in an attempt to shed payroll for the free-agent class expected to be headlined by LeBron James the summer before Curry’s contract expires in 2011.
snippet: The Knicks have shopped Eddy Curry in an attempt to shed payroll for the free-agent class expected to be headlined by LeBron James the summer before Curry’s contract expires in 2011.
